body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is William Murphy and I am a customer service representative at CarStars, the leading car dealership in the area. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rachel. Can you please provide me with the last four digits of your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven eight seven four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. Now, could you also provide me with the first three digits of your home address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information with me, Rachel. I understand you have concerns about the product quality at CarStars. Your feedback is important to us and we want to ensure your satisfaction. Is there anything specific you'd like to address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've been feeling nervous about the recent car purchase I made. I noticed some issues with the paint quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rachel. Your feedback will help us improve our services. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will investigate the matter and get back to you with a resolution soon. Thank you for your time today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time Rachel. Have a great day!
